Package climatemonitoring.core

Class View

java.lang.Object
climatemonitoring.core.View
public class View extends Object
The View class manages the state of a view and handles rendering operations based on the configuration (headless or GUI)
Version:
1.0-SNAPSHOT
Author:
francescolops

    • resetStateData

      public boolean resetStateData(ViewState state)
      Resets the data of a specified view state. It can also be used to set variables for another view by getting the desired state with getState(String) method and casting to the correct view state implementation
      Parameters:
      state - The desired state
      Returns:
      True if the specified state exists in the view's state list, false if not

    • returnToPreviousState

      To return to the previous view state
